Plot
While in a retrieve operation of a virus in Berlin, the Covert One agent 
Rachel Russell is double-crossed by two dirty agents; she kills them and 
escapes, trying to find a hiding place and someone to trust to protect 
the vials. Meanwhile, the former Covert One agent Dr. Jon Smith is also 
in Berlin with his beloved fiancÃƒÂ©e Sophie Amsden participating in a 
congress. When three persons die with bleeding, the doctors disclose a 
Hades virus outbreak, an extreme rare Ebola variant. Jon and Sophie return 
to the USA to research a cure, and Jon discovers a huge combination of 
bio-terrorism and conspiracy.
